entries.title_d: On command by Admiral Kilnstrider, inspect the suspicious ship near a distant nebula.
entries.title: Endor System: Intrigue
entries.split_quest_alert: \#pcontrast3 Kilnstrider: < \#pcontrast1 I suspected as much. Wait, we have a ship moving fast from that location.  Get into persuit, do not let them get away Captain. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.quest_location_d: a Nebula in the Endor System just outside of normal sensor sweeps.
entries.quest_inspect_d: Target the craft and use the default 'I' key or /inspect to determine what cargo they possess.
entries.quest_dock_d: If the target has the cargo you are interested in, disable them by targeting either the engines or reactor with the default component cycle keys '[' or ']', once the ship is disabled you can pull up close and with the ship targeted use the /dock command to retrieve the cargo.
